name: 何必江湖 Why To JiangHu
name_original: 何必江湖 Why To JiangHu
description:
The combat mode is cards, the movement mode is flags, paired with different weapons and armor, and internal skill moves, to defeat the opponent all the way until the final boss.

In addition to the main content of battles in 'Why the Jianghu', you can also:

·Mining
·Find hidden items
·Making equipment and dishes
·Release and complete the wanted warrant
·Remind passersby of goodwill and transactions


Of course, these are not necessary, but they can help you improve your strength or gain more fun.
